1.content:
One day the girls were touring the East Coast singing all of their songs and envy looked over a certain group of friends. All the girls were perfect, on the outside at least, and these friends thought why not use some of our tricks against them.

The first one to be taken was...
1.title: She Started It

choices: Lauren wakes up in her room
Lauren wakes up in a basement
14.content:
http://cdn02.cdn.justjaredjr.com/wp-cont...

Lauren was walking alone on the paths of Charleston wanting some peace and quiet which wasn't being given to her with her sisters.

They were all loud and Lauren couldn't think about the things she had to get done.

Luckily Cimorelli wasn't that popular so she could walk around like a normal person sulking.

She stuffed her hands in her pockets subconsciously hiding her crooked fingers she says she is proud about.

That was before both of her arms are grabbed harshly and her mouth is covered with some drug knocking her out.

"Now what was her problem?" Jill the main leader of the taking of Lauren asks.

"Hers is the hardest, invisible."
14.title: Lauren

141.content:
That was a terrible nightmare. Lauren thought to herself as she rubbed her eyes.

"Lauren!" She heard her younger sisters Lauren voice come from outside the door. "Screw it! I'm coming in you better be wearing clothes." Dani covered her eyes slowly opening the door not wanting to be entirely intruding.

She didn't see Lauren anywhere though.

"Dani?" Lauren asked her confused sister who was looking around the room.

Little did Lauren know Dani couldn't see her or hear her.

"Lauren if you are playing hide and seek you are seventeen almost an adult." Lauren got up standing in front of Dani waving her hand in front of her face.

Dani felt the air move and the warmth of Lauren in front of her making her feel crazy.

"I wonder where Lauren went." Dani decided to go check if her other sisters had seen Lauren.
141.title: Lauren wakes up in her room

choices: Bring Lauren back to her body for an hour
14131.content:
"I'm guessing you're wondering where Lauren went." Dani's struggled against the rope that was tying her harshly against the chair.

Dani tried to speak but the words got caught in her throat.

"Cat got your tongue? So sad." Jill says as Dani tries to find the cause of her muteness.

"No one wanted to hear your annoying voice anymore." Jill laughs at Dani's fruitless attempts to speak.

"Here's your sister." One of the brutes behind Jill grabbed Lauren's soulless body and threw it in front of Dani. "Body at least."

If Dani could make any sound it would be sobbing looking at Lauren's limp body.

"She's not dead."

Then why would you throw her? Dani screamed in her head knowing that Lauren would wake up with multiple bruises lining her back that just harshly hit the floor.

"You mad early her feel pretty bad this morning by ignoring her." This morning was when Dani looked for her in their bedroom.

Then the word annoying rings through her head again remembering crying as she told Lauren what she wanted on her forehead for their Worth It video.

Lauren's invisible.

"You learn fast." Jill was impressed with the youngest sister for figuring it out.

"Need her back." A gruff voice calls out making Jill mad but knowing it is true.
14131.title: Dani

15.content:
Dani was on her phone reading through text messages sad that her crush, which she was slightly obsessed with, didn't text her back.

She sighed heavily closing her eyes as she drifted into a deep sleep on the bed.

Dani woke up and she was...
15.title: Dani

info.brief_description: Hopefully you know the Cimorelli sisters.
info.description: The six Cimorelli sisters get in a lot of trouble when they piss off the wrong group of people.
